document_data.name: The Broken Harp
document_data.mainbody: '''The Broken Harp''' was a tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was built right on the western edge of Esmeltaran next to [[Lake Esmel]].
document_data.Services: The Broken Harp provided relatively poor service for its middling prices. It was a popular meeting spot for anyone who considered themselves an enemy of the [[Harpers]].
